descendants.content:
@breadandcircuses

It almost seems like the entire legal system is stacked in favor of BigOil. People are getting heavy sentences for merely talking about peaceful protests and now organizations may get sued out of existence.

Odd that the legal system favors the rich and powerful few. It would be pretty bad if the rest of society was structured that way too.

(Toot may contain trace elements of sarcasm.)

account.note:
I'm an environmental economist who researches econ pedagogy to make learning economics marginally less dismal.

My pipe-dream is to write a fantasy novel/economics textbook, which is getting closer to reality every day.

#economics #TeachEcon #sustainability #DoughnutEconomics #degrowth

Profile pic is me smiling in front of a whiteboard with economics gibberish -- cause econ makes me happy.

Background is my dog, Freya, who is derpily sticking her tongue out while passed out.

fields.name: About me
fields.value: Making econ marginally less dismal one post at a time. I teach economics at the UC Denver and am an all around nerd. My goal is to combine my passion for all things fantasy/sci-fi and love of economics to lower the cost of learning econ.

fields.name: Fantastical Economics
fields.value: You can find my first-ever short story that covers the circular economy and sustainability in a sci-fi setting here: https://edgeryders.eu/t/circular-reasoning/19717

descendants.content:
@FantasticalEconomics @breadandcircuses

I was putting together my 20 books set of posts and this was in my first 10. As far as I'm concerned, the legal system is not worth the silly wigs the participants wear.

I guess the old meme of 'Always has been' would apply here.

account.note:

East coast Canadian with a BA in Sociology. Somewhere in there I also minored in Philosophy and German. Pretty sure I would have piled Latin in there had the Genetics courses not been there. Safe to say I like an array of things.
